content:
white doily with yellow and black flowers for a similar doily with roses see rose doily 1
**size ** approximately 12 inches 30 5 cm in diameter
**materials ** * j &p coats or clark s o n t best 6-cord mercerized crochet size 30 2 small balls each white and dark yellow * j &p coats or clark s o n t pearl cotton size 5 1 ball black * steel crochet hook no 10 vintage pattern published 1949 no yardage given for balls of thread 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rose-doily
